prefix.currentPrefix:
The current prefix is `{prefix}`.
To change it, use `{prefix}prefix <new prefix>`, without the **<>**.
prefix.invalidPrefix: The new prefix cannot have more than 5 characters.
prefix.prefixChanged: The prefix was successfully changed to `{newPrefix}`.

language.languageChanged: The language was successfully changed to `{updatedLanguage}`.

message.cooldown: Please wait **{timeLeft}** seconds before using that command again.
message.cmdNoPerm: You do not have permission to use that command!
